00019 const char* ENCODE_TYPE_STR[jma::Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM] = {"EUC-JP", "SHIFT-JIS", "UTF-8"};
00020 
00026 string toLower(const char* s) {
00027     string str(s);
00028     for(size_t i=0; i<str.size(); ++i)
00029     {
00030         char c = str[i];
00031         if((c >= 'A') && (c <= 'Z'))
00032         {
00033             c += 'a' - 'A';
00034             str[i] = c;
00035         }
00036     }
00037     return str;
00038 }

00053 Knowledge::EncodeType Knowledge::getEncodeType() const

00058 Knowledge::EncodeType Knowledge::decodeEncodeType(const char* encodeStr)
00059 {
00060     assert(encodeStr);
00061 
00062     string lower = toLower(encodeStr);
00063     if(lower == "euc-jp" || lower == "eucjp")
00064     {
00065         return Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_EUCJP;
00066     }
00067     else if(lower == "shift-jis" || lower == "sjis")
00068     {
00069         return Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_SJIS;
00070     }
00071     else if(lower == "utf-8" || lower == "utf8")
00072     {
00073         return Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8;
00074     }
00075 
00076     // unknown character encoding type
00077     return Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM;
00078 }
00079 
00080 const char* Knowledge::encodeStr(EncodeType encodeType)
00081 {
00082     if(encodeType < ENCODE_TYPE_NUM)
00083         return ENCODE_TYPE_STR[encodeType];
00084 
00085     // unknown encoding type
00086     return 0;
00087 }
